Brown Spot.reason: Caused by the fungus Bipolaris oryzae due to warm, wet conditions.
Brown Spot.solution: Use resistant varieties and apply appropriate fungicides.

Leaf Smut.reason: Caused by the fungus Entyloma oryzae in high humidity.
Leaf Smut.solution: Use fungicide spray and proper field sanitation.

Bacterial Blight.reason: Caused by Xanthomonas oryzae bacteria spread by wind and water.
Bacterial Blight.solution: Use certified seeds and avoid overhead irrigation.
